ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: LLE is a non-linear algorithm for mapping high-dimensional data into a lower dimensional (intrinsic) space. This package provides the main functions to performs the LLE alogrithm including some enhancements like subset selection, calculation of the intrinsic dimension etc.

LLE is a non-linear algorithm for mapping high-dimensional data into a lower dimensional (intrinsic) space. This package provides the main functions to performs the LLE alogrithm including some enhancements like subset selection, calculation of the intrinsic dimension etc.

name: r-lle
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '1.1' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-lle
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/lle_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/lle/lle_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 13cafa6262cd67ba5d051b3b73d0978151c7521a32920566b99f21c27f3d9827

build:
  number: 1007
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-mass
    - r-scatterplot3d
    - r-snowfall
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-mass
    - r-scatterplot3d
    - r-snowfall

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('lle')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('lle')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=lle
  license: GPL-3.0-only
  summary: LLE is a non-linear algorithm for mapping high-dimensional data into a lower dimensional
    (intrinsic) space. This package provides the main functions to performs the LLE
    alogrithm including some enhancements like subset selection, calculation of the
    intrinsic dimension etc.
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
